title: Nvidia Shared Crucial Information With Investors | The Motley Fool
content:
In today's video, I discuss recent updates impacting Nvidia ( NVDA +2.26% ) and other artificial intelligence (AI) companies. To learn more, check out the short video, consider subscribing, and click the special offer link below.

*Stock prices used were the after-market prices of Oct. 24, 2025. The video was published on Oct. 24, 2025.
meta_description: Nvidia released a new presentation outlining its trillion-dollar market opportunity.
